alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, eastern Decatur, Grady, Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 352 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Havana to 6 miles northeast of Monticello. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Thomasville, Cairo, Havana, Boston, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Barwick, Climax, Alma, Dillon, Everett, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Iamonia, Laingkat, Calvary, Princes Still and Nickleville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
